item.description:
Hi, Isabelle and I are hoping to get a weekly walking group here at Dorr's Pond. I chose Thursday nights, but am open to discussion should another night benefit more walkers.

We will meet up for a 7:00 walk around the pond on the walking path. Look for us in the parking area nearest the pond, buy the "house." Please come a few minutes early to socialize.

THIS WEEK WE WILL BE WALKING CLOCKWISE AROUND THE POND (this will change week to week so we don't get into a predictable pattern). So if you are a few minutes late, please catch up with us!

Please email me with any questions. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Izzy (rottie) and I will be by the boathouse

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Dorr's Pond @ Livingston Park, Manchester
